timeline.bodyText:
Just to confirm, this does mean that we can only install into 2020.2.6397.94 - 2020.2.7660.26 of IntelliJ 2020.2 (it doesn't just limit us to AS 4.2 Canary versions)?
It looks like the current stable version of 2020.2 is:
IntelliJ IDEA 2020.2.3 (Community Edition)
Build #IC-202.7660.26, built on October 6, 2020
timeline.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: Correct. I tested that the plugin installs correctly everywhere. We'll be releasing a new build for canary when it comes out next month. If 2020.2.1 comes out we may have to do another.
replies.author: stevemessick
